candidates.name: Don Lake
candidates.why_elect: I have been in leadership and governance roles since I was still in high school, and have worked with leadership teams in non-profit organisations over a long period of time. As a medical graduate (GP) I have worked with individuals and communities and understand what 'healthy' looks like.
candidates.why_stand: I believe strongly in representative government where ordinary people get to have a say in issues that directly affect them. I believe we are in an age where long term planning has got to focus on 'the big' and where businesses need to partner with council to achieve shared outcomes.
